chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: The package went back to Backmarket because it wasn't deliverable. Can I get this again but sent to a different address? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

It looks like the parcel is on the way back to you.

The customer wishes a reshipment and confirmed his address: 

Gisela Hansmann
Uferstr. 22
49828 Neuenhaus
Deutschland
0162 9829001

Can you ship it again, after you received it back?

Thank you and have a successful working day

Regards,
Batuhan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the reshipment of the parcel. We will provide the tracking number soon. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

The customer was asked where to send the parcel and wants the package to be resent to:

Recipient: Gisela Hansmann
Address: Uferstraße. 22
ZIP-Code: 49828 Neuenhaus

Please let us know within 24 hours if this was taken in to consideration for the new sending and provide us the new TN to forward the customer. Thank you for understanding. 

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the reshipment of the order. We are still waiting a reply from them. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The tracking number is 1ZBF1560D901125921. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello ecomobile,

Thank you for letting us know. Was the previously provided address considered for this shipping? Please let us know in order to inform the customer. 

We also noticed, that the provided TN is not active or recognized at the carrier tracking site (see attachments) could you check if you provided it correctly? Thank you in advance. 

Thank you for understanding,

Paulo from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The parcel is being shipped to the new address: 
Gisela Hansmann
Uferstr. 22
49828 Neuenhaus
Deutschland
0162 9829001

The tracking link works. The estimated date of delivery is 28/05/2024.

Thank you.
Regards,
YR

Hi ecomobile,

thank you for letting us know. The customer was informed accordingly. 

Just checking the reception, once done, to close the case and SAV accordingly. Thank you for understanding.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Paulo Back Market customer Care

Hello,
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Please Refund
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The customer had the following issue with their item: The unit turns randomly off.

They would like a refund.

We’re continuing with the return. Please keep in mind that you have 2 business days to refund the order after receiving the package.

Thank you,

Paulo Back Market Customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Paulo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the reminder. We will proceed with the refund soon.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for letting us know. The customer was informed accordingly. Why did you discount 5,00 € from the refund? Thank you in advance.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We provided a partial refund of 5 euros as the customer did not return the cable along with the device. According to the quality charter, the customer is to get a partial refund of 5 euros less if the cable is not returned.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

Since you didn't report that at any time upon reception, we needed to check. The customer will be informed and the case and SAV closed accordingly. Thank you for understanding.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team
